p: The results of precision and accuracy were shown in Table 1. The intraday and interday precision (CV%) values ranged from 0.05% to 3.5%, whereas the accuracy values calculated from recovery distributed between 98% and 103%. These results showed acceptable precision and accuracy which were complying with the FDA guidance on bioanalytical methods [ 25]. Therefore, the established method is suitable for the simultaneous quantitation of selected compounds in F. multiï¬‚ora.
